reviews.review: Half-Life 2 is another FPS standard set by Valve. The implementation of the Source engine and the Havok physics engine makes this game a must play for any gamer. I played through this many times on the Xbox 360 and it was even better on PC. The graphics look so good and not to mention the game came out in 2004. Great job Valve.

An incredible game, intriguing story and aged well, even to 2021. A must-play, impossible not to love. The game mechanics work beautifully. My only negative is sometimes it takes a few minutes for me to realise where to go, but usually starting fresh the next day will clear my mind and allow me to see. This is undoubtedly my favourite flatscreen story game.
its a good game. Good story, fluent gameplay, a little puzzle here and there, I recommend it.
Addictive. Nail biting. good UI and unexpected twists.
Amazing to see, that even in 2021 HL2 doesn't feel rusty at all.

Back when I was a dumb kid in middle school, I used to play this all the time, but I never really appreciated it.

Now I'm 22, and I've went back and played the entirety of the series, and I actually loved it.

This is a videogame that changed what we thought games could do. Its engine showed what a dynamic physics engine could do for player interaction. It has a great story that needs to be expanded upon in its sequels (Half Life 3 wya) I honestly think this is one of the greatest FPS games in history

10/10

What can I say about this game that hasn't been said before, it's one of the best ones ever, the story is great, the gameplay is fun and the graphics have barely aged.

Play it.

Half life was basically the reason I got Steam more than 10 years ago. it's ragdoll and environment physics were revolutionary for it's time. the gameplay is amazing and the map design is great but can be confusing every once in a while. Which is refreshing in a time were games hold your hand every step of the way.

Pro's
-Excellent graphics for it's time
-Amazing maps and atmosphere
-Enemies are a bit of a challenge 
-A wide array of different enemies
-Excellent voice acting


Con's
-AI can either walk in your way or push you into enemies.
-You can get stuck every once in a while due to glitches usually caused by the player trying to move to fast ([spoiler]Beach Section and Portal near the end of the game [/spoiler] 

I can recommend this game for people that want to try half life for the first time after hearing about half life Alyx or veteran players revisiting after many years.
